attributes.contentHtml:
Oliver1234dotdot Jack was used by Badsk, along with all of his staff. You have no idea how many times he has "disappeared" from the community just to come back and threaten his staff into doing what he wants.

Badsk should be remembered as a bad person, not Jack.

edit: added more context

For example of Badsk making others do what he wants, look above to my previous posts where I posted a screenshot of bad calling SamCoThePug lazy for not fixing something, when Sam was not even staff at the host at that time.

Bad has also previously "Doxxed" members of his staff team (e.g. Bread), and has made death threats to anyone that tries to stop him (he said he would break my wrist for goodness sake) I also accidentally leaked the chat messages in the staff group, where he made multiple threats towards Chirag, and me.

Fuck you, Badsk.

attributes.title: ViaHost, Sryden, ExoHost, AltHost, HelioNodes, BlockNode | Bad/Layer
